name: Beef Burger
instructions: In a large bowl, mix the ground beef, salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce and garlic powder until just combined
Divide the mixture into 4 equal portions and shape each portion into a patty about 1/2 inches thick
Heat a large non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat
Cook the patties for about 4 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 73C/160F for well-done patties
Toast the hamburger buns on the griddle or in the oven until golden brown
Assemble the burgers with your desired toppings and serve.

name: Cup of Water
instructions: Pour the water into a glass

name: Chicken Burger
instructions: In a large bowl, mix the ground chicken, breadcrumbs, egg, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, basil, salt and pepper until just combined
Divide the mixture into 4 equal portions and shape each portion into a patty about 1/2 inches thick
Heat a large non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat
Cook the chicken patties for about 6 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 74C/165F
Toast the hamburger buns on the griddle or in the ove until golden brown
Assemble the chicken burgers with your desired toppings and serve immediately. This recipe serves two.

name: Fish Burger
instructions: In a large bowl, flake the fish into small pieces
Add the breadcrumbs, egg, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, dill, salt, and pepper to the bowl and mix until just combined
Divide the mixture into 4 equal portions and shape each portion into a patty about 1/2 inches thick
Heat a large non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat
Cook the fish burgers for about 4 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 63C/145F
Toast the hamburger buns on the griddle or in the oven until golden brown
Assemble the fish burgers with your desired toppings and serve immediately

name: Pasta (Tomato Sauce)
instructions: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package until it is firm
In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat
Chop the onions and add to the pan. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes
Mince the garlic and add to the saucepan. Cook for another minute
Add the diced tomatoes (undrained), dried basil, salt and black pepper to the saucepan. Stir to combine
Bring the sauce to a boil, then reduce heat to low and let it simmer for 10 minutes
Serve the cooked pasta with the sauce on top, add grated parmesan cheese (optional)

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
instructions: Pour 5 cups of cold water into a large stockpot and set aside
Slice 3 thick slices of ginger. Cut the spring onion in half and crush the onion heads
Place the ginger and spring onion in the water and bring it to a boil. Let this boil for 30 minutes over medium-high heat. Meanwhile prepare a bowl of ice water and set this aside

Once the water has boiled, add the meat. After 1 minute, remove the chicken and add it into the bowl of ice water. Repeat the previous steps 4-5 times for chicken wings and legs. Repeat 2-3 times for chicken breast

Continue to boil the chicken in the stock on low heat for 30 minutes. Remove the meat from the stock and place it in the ice water with 2 tablespoons of salt and 1 teaspoon of fish sauce. Leave for 40-60 minutes and slice into bite size, keeping the stock for later use.
Wash the rice 3-4 times. Add 4 cups of the stock from the previous step with butter, lemongrass, chicken powder, salt and turmeric powder.
Put this on normal settings in the rice cooker, stir halfway through cooking
For the ginger sauce, start by peeling the ginger skin. Chop finely into the desired size and add salt for taste.
Heat the oil in a small pan until it begins to smoke. Pour over the ginger and mix well. Leave to cool slightly before serving
Assemble on a plate, laying the meat on top or on the side of the rice. Garnish with cilantro and serve with chili (optional):

name: Mee Goreng
instructions: In a large pot of boiling water, blanch the noodles until just loosened (roughly 20 seconds) and strain immediately. Set aside
In a small bowl, whisk together the sweet soy sauce, sesame oil, ketchup sauce and oyster sauce. This will form your noodle sauce
In a pan set over medium heat, add the chicken breast and let it fry until fully cooked.
Add garlic, and let it saute until soft.
Add shrimp, fish cakes, and fry until the shrimps become mostly pink.
Sweep the ingredients to the side of the pan. Pour in whisked eggs and mix with the other ingredients.
Add chives and bean sprouts. Cook until the vegetables have wilted slightly.
Add the noodles and the noodle sauce. Mix thoroughly until well combined. Serve and enjoy!
